channel.title: Using LED as audio output feedback
channel.description:
Hi,
I would like to use a LED to have visual feedback of audio output amplitude. My approach is using an envelope follower conected to an analogue GPIO output in order to change LED intensity.
But I have some doubts that I hope you can solve:
Is this a right approach? Is there other object to convert s-rate to k-rate values to control LED? Could it damage my analogue PIN?
Best
